channel.title: Can anyone tell me where to get hold of Mysql server source
channel.description:
Does anyone know a source that is used alongside Mysql ? ive searched everything from Php to webservers lol.
I have a server on my localhost but im wanting to stick it on my webserver so i can play too without so much lag. with the edition of mysql ill be able to get a ranking system on my site and all account editing etc can be done away from home
Any help much appreciated :)

item.title: Can anyone tell me where to get hold of Mysql server source
item.dc:creator: @frigger908 frigger908
item.description:
@frigger908 wrote:

i do. i have a dodian mysql source. pm me if your interested.

Read full topic
